about_the_game:
Ling Notes, Ancient Cemetery Palace - Xiaohua Tomb Exploration Team DLC (with 29999 Ling coins) contains the costumes of the role Xiaohua Tomb Exploration Team, and 29999 Ling coins are attached with DLC.

The moonlight was high-definition, and the pale silver light slanted across the branches on the stone tablets. A gust of cloudy wind blew, and the notes scattered in the graveway made a rustling sound. In the dilapidated palace, two thick stoneworks were chained by huge chains, which buried a secret that spanned thousands of years.
detailed_description:
Ling Notes, Ancient Cemetery Palace - Xiaohua Tomb Exploration Team DLC (with 29999 Ling coins) contains the costumes of the role Xiaohua Tomb Exploration Team, and 29999 Ling coins are attached with DLC.
